author: deweese
msg: 1) Fixed visible title in flowText, moved namespace decl.

author: deweese
msg: 1) flowText now support soft-hyphen, and zero width space/joiner
2) flowText now properly calculates leading, ascent and descent for line.
3) Text selections stay correct when content is animated

author: deweese
msg: 1) Implemented flowText element based on SVG 1.1 specification.
Currently lives in the Batik Extension namespace.
3) Fixed some dynamic stuff with other extensions.

author: hillion
msg: - Unknown CSS properties or rules are now ignored,
- improved handling of errors that happen in a CSS update event listener.
